data.actual_result: There's a difference between how the badge on desktop and Android are positioned
data.expected_result: All discord badges should be perfectly centered on users profiles
data.short_description: Android v4.4.4 Specific Issue: The discord badges are not perfectly centered on users profiles.
data.steps_to_repro: - Search a user that has a badge on their profile (preferable, a discord partner, because the bug is more visible) - Go to their profile - Observe the badge - There's a difference. The badge is not perfectly centered like on any other platform - (Additional: you can also to observe the attachments. A picture is taken on PC/Desktop and one is taken on my device)
